title: Workflow-Based Double-Loop Learning for Professional Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in the relevant field (medical/legal/technical) and proficiency in basic online learning tools
context.additional_context: Professionals in healthcare, law, and technology reconstruct real-world work processes in a virtual enterprise environment, experiencing double-loop learning.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex workflows using workflow modeling tools and derive three or more improvement strategies.
Learners can apply meta-reflective thinking to existing workflows through project-based assessments and perform two or more process revisions.
Learners can design customized learning pathways applicable to real-world scenarios by combining workflow blocks through collaboration with peers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
